object.name: MessageId
object.description: This object represents a unique message identifier.
object.html_description: This object represents a unique message identifier.
object.rst_description: This object represents a unique message identifier.

annotations.description: Unique message identifier. In specific instances (e.g., message containing a video sent to a big chat), the server might automatically schedule a message instead of sending it immediately. In such cases, this field will be 0 and the relevant message will be unusable until it is actually sent

annotations.name: message_id
